title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: Learn full-stack web development from scratch. This comprehensive course covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects and get job-ready skills.
shortDescription: Master full-stack web development with hands-on projects
learningObjectives: Build responsive websites with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Create dynamic web applications with React
Develop backend APIs with Node.js and Express
Understand modern web development best practices
requirements: Access to a computer with internet connection

title: Data Science with Python
description: Comprehensive data science course covering Python programming, data analysis, machine learning, and data visualization. Learn to work with real datasets and build predictive models.
shortDescription: Master data science and machine learning with Python
learningObjectives: Master Python programming for data science
Analyze and visualize data with Pandas and Matplotlib
Build machine learning models with Scikit-learn
Understand statistical concepts for data science
requirements: Basic programming knowledge helpful but not required

title: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native. Learn to create beautiful, native mobile apps with a single codebase.
shortDescription: Create mobile apps for iOS and Android with React Native
learningObjectives: Build mobile apps for iOS and Android
Work with device features like camera and GPS
Publish apps to App Store and Google Play
requirements: Basic knowledge of React and JavaScript
Understanding of mobile development concepts helpful
